body:
#Unity2020 is a ambitious plan to end the covert corrupt between the two parties, that play sides against each other to trick the American people to play along with the game and not pay attention to where economic theft and stolen opportunity are being enacted by different parties including government and corporate entities. Proxies for people with real power and cynical self interest at the expense of the U.S. people, and the rest of the world to an extent. 

Help us end the corruption by taking out one of the bricks supporting it, by not allowing another corrupt stiff in a suit who makes false claims of having all the answers with their belief in god who championed them or their overwhelming insight into economics that lets them know trickle down economics or selling cheap labor to china or increased regulation that makes new business impossible with overhead costs being an ever increased barrier to entry, is really just in our best interests. Whether its the DNC or the GOP, their playing the same game and their are lying to us about their own interest all the time, by propping each other up as the bad guy, they get away with bad behavior if we focus on picking the lesser of two evils. Always conveniently excusing their own evil. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IGAroR49Uss&feature=youtu.be

If you believe in this message please share it, and look up unity 2020 to learn more.

title: End the two party corruption system. Unity 2020

author.bio: Founded +foodporn, +foodpics and +citypop. Former active user, current lurker; contact me at u/lol on getcomet.net
author.bio_html: Founded +foodporn, +foodpics and +citypop. Former active user, current lurker; contact me at u/lol on getcomet.net

body:
It's a good concept, but all we really need is a way to get rid of the winner-take-all system that inevitably results in a two-party system. But neither of the big parties will repeal it since it benefits them. We're pretty much stuck in a "the voters are discontent but we can't do anything about it" situation.

The other downside to our system is in global politics, it's moderate right-authoritarian vs far right-authoritarian. We've gotten pushed so far to the right. And I'm sure one of you will find that wrong because you agree with either of those parties, but I encourage you to do some research into what the economic and social statuses of major global political parties.
body_html:
It's a good concept, but all we really need is a way to get rid of the winner-take-all system that inevitably results in a two-party system. But neither of the big parties will repeal it since it benefits them. We're pretty much stuck in a "the voters are discontent but we can't do anything about it" situation.

The other downside to our system is in global politics, it's moderate right-authoritarian vs far right-authoritarian. We've gotten pushed so far to the right. And I'm sure one of you will find that wrong because you agree with either of those parties, but I encourage you to do some research into what the economic and social statuses of major global political parties.

#Unity2020 is a ambitious plan to end the covert corrupt between the two parties, that play sides against each other to trick the American people to play along with the game and not pay attention to where economic theft and stolen opportunity are being enacted by different parties including government and corporate entities. Proxies for people with real power and cynical self interest at the expense of the U.S. people, and the rest of the world to an extent.

Help us end the corruption by taking out one of the bricks supporting it, by not allowing another corrupt stiff in a suit who makes false claims of having all the answers with their belief in god who championed them or their overwhelming insight into economics that lets them know trickle down economics or selling cheap labor to china or increased regulation that makes new business impossible with overhead costs being an ever increased barrier to entry, is really just in our best interests. Whether its the DNC or the GOP, their playing the same game and their are lying to us about their own interest all the time, by propping each other up as the bad guy, they get away with bad behavior if we focus on picking the lesser of two evils. Always conveniently excusing their own evil.

parent.body:
It's a good concept, but all we really need is a way to get rid of the winner-take-all system that inevitably results in a two-party system. But neither of the big parties will repeal it since it benefits them. We're pretty much stuck in a "the voters are discontent but we can't do anything about it" situation.

The other downside to our system is in global politics, it's moderate right-authoritarian vs far right-authoritarian. We've gotten pushed so far to the right. And I'm sure one of you will find that wrong because you agree with either of those parties, but I encourage you to do some research into what the economic and social statuses of major global political parties.
parent.body_html:

And I'm sure one of you will find that wrong because you agree with either of those parties, but I encourage you to do some research into what the economic and social statuses of major global political parties.

body: I like this, even if it falls into the same media trap and character assassination campaign on Trump since 2015. Without that media campaign, one would see Trump as how he was seen before 2010: someone who puts on a persona of arrogance but has deep convictions and optimism in the U.S. for some reason. That’s the opposite of Biden. I know this thing’s trying to build mutual trust, but I hate that it has to kowtow to the propaganda to appeal to people.

+TRUMP +TRUMP2020 +DonaldJTrump
guild.name: Biden2020

parent.body: its actually set up specifically to avoid that kinda stuff. Theres no political financing from donations. Its all a community effort.
parent.body_html: its actually set up specifically to avoid that kinda stuff. Theres no political financing from donations. Its all a community effort.

post.body:
#Unity2020 is a ambitious plan to end the covert corrupt between the two parties, that play sides against each other to trick the American people to play along with the game and not pay attention to where economic theft and stolen opportunity are being enacted by different parties including government and corporate entities. Proxies for people with real power and cynical self interest at the expense of the U.S. people, and the rest of the world to an extent. 

Help us end the corruption by taking out one of the bricks supporting it, by not allowing another corrupt stiff in a suit who makes false claims of having all the answers with their belief in god who championed them or their overwhelming insight into economics that lets them know trickle down economics or selling cheap labor to china or increased regulation that makes new business impossible with overhead costs being an ever increased barrier to entry, is really just in our best interests. Whether its the DNC or the GOP, their playing the same game and their are lying to us about their own interest all the time, by propping each other up as the bad guy, they get away with bad behavior if we focus on picking the lesser of two evils. Always conveniently excusing their own evil. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IGAroR49Uss&feature=youtu.be

If you believe in this message please share it, and look up unity 2020 to learn more.

post.title: End the two party corruption system. Unity 2020

author.bio:
Here for a replacement to Reddit, sorta. Im also interested to hear what conversations take place. Seems today we have to be involved in our own communities and online frontiers to actually hear what the real news is.
  
Philosopher and online agitation

body: id say its very likely. And we'd probably crucify our own Socrates before we realize our mistake. The question is how long is it going to take to really start to slide downhill?

parent.body: I like this, even if it falls into the same media trap and character assassination campaign on Trump since 2015. Without that media campaign, one would see Trump as how he was seen before 2010: someone who puts on a persona of arrogance but has deep convictions and optimism in the U.S. for some reason. That’s the opposite of Biden. I know this thing’s trying to build mutual trust, but I hate that it has to kowtow to the propaganda to appeal to people.
